alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Camden, southeastern Pierce, central Brantley and northeastern Charlton Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Patterson to 9 miles southeast of Hickox. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Hickox, Raybon, Atkinson, Tarboro and Hortense. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Pierce
